meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large branches to minimize the total number of branches while meeting customer service and teller constraints.

sets.name: BRANCH_TYPES
sets.description: Types of branches the bank can build.

params.name: customers_per_branch
params.description: Number of customers each branch type can serve per day.

params.name: tellers_per_branch
params.description: Number of bank tellers required for each branch type.

params.name: total_tellers_available
params.description: Total number of bank tellers available.

params.name: min_customers_served
params.description: Minimum number of customers that need to be served per day.

vars.name: num_branches
vars.description: Number of branches to build for each branch type.

objective.name: min_total_branches
objective.description: Minimize the total number of branches built.

constraints.name: teller_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of tellers used by branches must not exceed available tellers.

constraints.name: customer_service_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of customers served by branches must meet the minimum requirement.
